webSearchSummary.title: Summary of Web Search
webSearchSummary.description: A prompt that summarizes information from the web search for use in the action.
webSearchSummary.einstein:description: A prompt populated with relevant data for use by the planner service for web search.

citationSources.title: Citation Sources
citationSources.description: Source links from the retrieved content used in the web search summary.
citationSources.einstein:description: Source links for the chunks in the hydrated prompt that's used by the planner service.
